Uses of Package
com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter

Packages that use com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter
com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter A collection of HBase Filters to make selecting data in HBase easier. 
 

Classes in com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter used by com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter
AbstractColumnVersionTimerangeFilter
          Abstract base class for filtering a column based on a timerange and number of versions, specifically meant to implement the column selection functionality of the Query Planner.
DeployedFilter
          Acts as a wrapper around another Filter allowing for that filter to be dynamically deployed into an HBase cluster.
FamilyOnlyColumnVersionTimerangeFilter
          Filters a column specified by family and based on a timerange and number of versions, specifically meant to implement the column selection functionality of the Query Planner.
